original_text: Then he commanded the steward of his house, “Fill the men's sacks with food, as much as they can carry, and put each man's money in the mouth of his sack,
korean_text: 요셉이 그의 집 청지기에게 명하여 이르되 양식을 각자의 자루에 운반할 수 있을 만큼 채우고 각자의 돈을 그 자루에 넣고

sentences.original_text: Then he commanded the steward of his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 그의 집 청지기에게 명령했습니다

sentences.original_text: Fill the men's sacks with food
as much as they can carry
and put each man's money in the mouth of his sack
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 사람의 돈을 그의 자루 입구에 넣어라
